Title: The Ring Thing
Writer: Chris Silber (author), André Küttel (author), Marc Schippert (author), Dominik Kaiser (author), Thorsten Wettcke (author), André Küttel (dialogue translation)
Actors: Edward Piccin, Gwendolyn Rich, Leo Roos, Sebastian Arenas
Plot: Middle Earth is... right in the heart of Europe! A spoof of the Lord of the Rings Trilogy set in Switzerland.
